title: Deep Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Introduction to Sustainable Wastewater Management: SDGs-Linked Micro-Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Engineering and Environmental Science Concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of wastewater treatment processes and their alignment with SDG 6 (Clean Water and Sanitation).
Learners can compare three types of wastewater treatment technologies through microlearning modules delivered in mobile environments.
Learners can propose sustainable water management solutions applicable to industrial settings by conducting team-based projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
